tool.name: Split LCBs into smaller LCBs

param.name: window_size
param.label: Default window size generating smaller LCBs

param.name: threshold
param.label: Threshold at which a given genome is part of the new small LCBs

tool.help:
**What it does**
Helps reduce large and non-sensical protein LCBs into real protein alignments.
**WARNING** Probably does not work if you have - strand genes. Need to test.
